overview: It seemed like it was almost over; the carnage the Crew had created cost them their vehicles, their licenses, their freedom and nearly their lives. Now with the smoke cleared and their probation lifted, Kenny Kelley and the Crew are back where they left off, doing real-live stunts on our nations’ roadways. These real action daredevils operate on their own terms and pure adrenaline while tearing up the streets of America! The Adrenaline Crew knows the outcome of their destruction and the price they will have to pay, but it’s all worth it for your entertainment.
title: Adrenaline Crew: Verdict Guilty
